Magic Notes:
Aberrant: Spell Trained (Occult)/Knows the Tentacular Limbs occult spell
Bard Dedication: Spell Trained (Occult)/Knows 2 occult cantrips
Bloodline Spells: Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Druid Dedication: Spell Trained (Primal)/Can prepare 2 primal cantrips each day
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Occult)
Master Spellcaster: Spell Master (Occult)
Occult Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Wizard Dedication: Spell Trained (Arcane)/Can prepare 2 arcane cantrips each day
Aberrant: Blood magic effect gives self or a target +2 Will saves for 1 rd
Arcane Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the arcane tradition
Bloodline Spells: Casting a bloodline or granted spell invokes a blood magic effect
Counterspell: (R) Expends a spell slot to attempt to counteract a spell with the same spell
Magic Sense: Has continuous 1st-level Detect Magic effects that increase to 3rd-level during Seek
Occult Evolution: Can spend 1 min to add an unknown mental occult spell to repertoire until next daily prep once per day
Primal Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the primal tradition
Signature Spells: Can heighten 1 chosen spell of each level without learning a heightened version
Sorcerer Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Widen Spell: (1) Increases the effect of a subsequent 10' or greater radius area instantaneous spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone instantaneous spell by 5', or the effect of a longer line or cone instantaneous spell by 10'
Wizard Dedication: Owns a spellbook with 4 arcane cantrips
